00037 // usb_user_device_descriptor
00038 code S_usb_device_descriptor usb_dev_desc =
00039 {
00040   sizeof(usb_dev_desc)
00041 , DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR
00042 , Usb_write_word_enum_struc(USB_SPECIFICATION)
00043 , DEVICE_CLASS
00044 , DEVICE_SUB_CLASS
00045 , DEVICE_PROTOCOL
00046 , EP_CONTROL_LENGTH
00047 , Usb_write_word_enum_struc(VENDOR_ID)

00049 , Usb_write_word_enum_struc(RELEASE_NUMBER)
00050 , MAN_INDEX
00051 , PROD_INDEX
00052 , SN_INDEX
00053 , NB_CONFIGURATION
00054 };

00056 // usb_user_configuration_descriptor FS
00057 code S_usb_user_configuration_descriptor usb_conf_desc = {
00058  { sizeof(S_usb_configuration_descriptor)
00059  , CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR
00060  , Usb_write_word_enum_struc(sizeof(S_usb_configuration_descriptor)\
00061        +sizeof(S_usb_interface_descriptor)   \
00062        +sizeof(S_usb_hid_descriptor)         \
00063        +sizeof(S_usb_endpoint_descriptor)    \
00064                               )
00065  , NB_INTERFACE
00066  , CONF_NB
00067  , CONF_INDEX
00068  , CONF_ATTRIBUTES
00069  , MAX_POWER
00070  }
00071  ,
00072  { sizeof(S_usb_interface_descriptor)
00073  , INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR
00074  , INTERFACE_NB_MOUSE
00075  , ALTERNATE_MOUSE
00076  , NB_ENDPOINT_MOUSE
00077  , INTERFACE_CLASS_MOUSE
00078  , INTERFACE_SUB_CLASS_MOUSE
00079  , INTERFACE_PROTOCOL_MOUSE
00080  , INTERFACE_INDEX_MOUSE
00081  }
00082  ,
00083  { sizeof(S_usb_hid_descriptor)
00084  , HID_DESCRIPTOR

00086  , HID_COUNTRY_CODE
00087  , HID_CLASS_DESC_NB
00088  , HID_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE
00089  , Usb_write_word_enum_struc(sizeof(S_usb_hid_report_descriptor_mouse))
00090  }
00091  ,
00092  { sizeof(S_usb_endpoint_descriptor)

00095  , EP_ATTRIBUTES_1

00098  }

00137 code S_usb_hid_report_descriptor_mouse usb_hid_report_descriptor_mouse = {{
00138       0x05,0x01,          /* Usage Page (Generic Desktop)      */
00139       0x09,0x02,          /* Usage (Mouse)                     */
00140       0xA1,0x01,          /* Collection (Application)          */
00141       0x09,0x01,          /* Usage (Pointer)                   */
00142       0xA1,0x00,          /* Collection (Application)          */
00143       0x05,0x09,          /* Usage Page (Button)               */
00144       0x19,0x01,          /* Usage Minimum (1)                 */
00145       0x29,0x03,          /* Usage Maximum (3)                 */
00146       0x15,0x00,          /* Logical Minimum (0)               */
00147       0x25,0x01,          /* Logical Maximum (1)               */
00148       0x75,0x01,          /* Report Size (1)                   */
00149       0x95,0x03,          /* Report Count (3)                  */
00150       0x81,0x02,          /* Input (Data, Variable, Absolute)  */
00151       0x75,0x05,          /* Report Size (5)                   */
00152       0x95,0x01,          /* Report Count (1)                  */
00153       0x81,0x01,          /* Input (Constant)                  */
00154       0x05,0x01,          /* Usage Page (Generic Desktop Control)*/
00155       0x09,0x30,          /* Usage X                           */
00156       0x09,0x31,          /* Usage Y                           */
00157       0x09,0x38,          /* Usage Wheel                       */
00158       0x15,0x81,          /* Logical Minimum (-127)            */
00159       0x25,0x7F,          /* Logical Maximum (127)             */
00160       0x75,0x08,          /* Report Size (8)                   */
00161       0x95,0x03,          /* Report Count (3)                  */
00162       0x81,0x06,          /* Input (Data, Variable, Absolute)  */
00163       0xC0,               /* End Collection                    */
00164       0xC0                /* End Collection                    */
00165 }};
